signUp.description: Creating an account in aigang.network you will get access to all products such as Data, Prediction market, Invest and Insure
signUp.emailSent: Email was sent to {0}. Follow instructions provided in the email.
signUp.dontReceiveEmail: If you didn't receive email, click:

retrievePassword.title: Reset Your Aigang Password
retrievePassword.dontReceiveEmail: If you didn't receive email, click:
retrievePassword.changeSuccessTitle: Your password has been successfully updated

activateEmail.title: Email activation
activateEmail.activated: Thank you for registration. Your account now is successfully activated and you can use all platform features. Please login to continue.

general.passwordDescription: Minimum password length must be 8 characters and consist of at least 2 alpha characters, 1 number and 1 special character
general.deactivateAccountDescription: If you decide that you no longer want to use Aigang Platform, it's easy to deactivate your account. When you deactivate your account, you're no longer availible to log in or access your private uploaded datasets.
general.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?

wallets.title: Wallets
wallets.description: You wallets list which were used by you on Aigang Platform

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Transactions list which were submited by you on Aigang Platform

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Settings for Aigang platform email notications

failedTransactions.title: Failed transactions
failedTransactions.description: When this notification type is on you will get notifications about failed transactions.

all.title: All
all.description: When this notification type is on you will get all notifications related with Insurance.

forecastPaymentReceived.title: Forecast payment received
forecastPaymentReceived.description: When this notification type is on you will get notifications after forecast payment information will be received in our system.

forecastWon.title: Forecast won
forecastWon.description: When this notification type is on you will get notifications after your forecast win.

errors.serverNotFoundRule1: Make sure you are connected to the Internet.
errors.serverNotFoundRule2: This might occur when the browser can not reach the server. Please try again later.
errors.contactIfError: If you see this error please contact us via email info@aigang.network

errors.useMetamask: To use all of our Platform features please Log in to Metamask Extension

predictions.noDescription: There is no description for this prediction

paymentInfo.title: Payment Information
paymentInfo.metamaskAlert: Atention! Do not leave this page until you confirm your transaction. Otherwise your transaction will be lost and forecast won't be counted.
paymentInfo.body: Your payment transaction was created succesfully. When payment will be processed we will inform you via email notification message. You can see your transaction status by clicking on transaction address.

confirmationDialog.title: Confirm your forecast
confirmationDialog.userNotLoggedIn: User must be logged in and connected to web3 provider (Metamask, Mist, etc.)

forecast.logInToWeb3: User must be connected to web3 provider (Metamask, Mist, etc.)
forecast.metamaskAlert: Atention! Do not leave this page until you confirm your transaction. Otherwise your transaction will be lost and forecast won't be paid out.
forecast.deleteForecastBody: This forecast and all data associated with it will be deleted from the plaform. You won't be able to revert this action later on.
forecast.deleteForecastConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this forecast?

product.instructionsIntro: In order to calculate your insurance price you have to:
product.instructionsDownloadApp: Download Aigang app on your android device
product.instructionsIMEI: Enter your device ID below (you will see it in the app)
product.instructionsConditions: Your device's data will be read, press continue if you agree
product.logInToCalculateInsurancePrice: You have to log in to calculate insurance price
product.agreeWithTermsAndConditions: You have to read terms and conditions to calculate insurance price
product.productPoolLimitReacher: Product premium pool limit has been reached
product.policiesLimitReached: This product has reached maximum number of policies

policy.readingDeviceDataAndCalculatingInsurance: Reading device data and calculating insurance price
policy.readingDeviceDataAndVerifyingClaim: Reading device data and verifying claim
policy.deletePolicyBody: This policy and all data associated with it will be deleted from the plaform. You won't be able to revert this action later on.
policy.deletePolicyConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this policy?
policy.deviceIdNotFound: Device with this ID was not found. Check your device for correct ID.
policy.serverError: Something went wrong. Please contact support: info@aigang.network

paymentInfo.title: Payment Information
paymentInfo.metamaskAlert: Atention! Do not leave this page until you confirm your transaction. Otherwise your transaction will be lost and policy won't be activated.
paymentInfo.body: Your payment transaction was created succesfully. When payment will be processed we will inform you via email notification message. You can see your transaction status by clicking on transaction address.

failedToVerifyDevice.title: Failed to verify your device:
failedToVerifyDevice.tip1: Check if your device is connected to internet,
failedToVerifyDevice.tip2: Check if your device still paired with our system,
failedToVerifyDevice.tip3: If you still have problems with verification please contact us via info@aigang.network.

policy.deviceClaimable: We detected that your device is broken. You can claim your policy.
policy.deviceNotClaimable: We read your device data and all parameters are good. At this moment your device is not claimable.

notLoggedToEthereumClientDialog.title: Not logged in to Ethereum Client
notLoggedToEthereumClientDialog.content: To insure your device, you need to have Ethereum Client in place. (Metamask, Parity, Ethereum Mist browser or any other client that supports Web3). For the best experience use Metamask.
